caption.title: severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) main protease (M pro) 3D structure (PDB 6LU7, 2.16 Å). (A) Transparent VdW surface and ribbon representation of M pro, coloured by its three domains: domain I (pink), domain II (green) and domain III (blue). (B) The catalytic pair formed by Cys145 and His41 (CPK colours with dark blue carbons). Images created using Maestro, release 2020-1 (Maestro, Schrödinger, LLC, New York, NY, 2020).
